item.title: Building and maintaining a smart home presentation
item.description: Here is a recent recording of a new talk I recently gave at North Dallas Developers on my experiences building and maintaining a smart home. Here is a high level overview of what is covered in the presentation: First Steps What are your Goals? Existing products and ecosystems Research Future technologies Are you the product? How-to choose a contractor Costs Accessibility Breaking Changes Companies will break you or sell your data Smart Home Hubs Automations Feedback Any feedback is greatly appreciated on how I can improve this talk.
